analysis.description:
Reentrancy in IRONtokenSale.IRONtokenSale (/unique_chucks/25/0x5e9cf9739de6bb500db12d678ec639592fe89060.sol#522-531):
	External calls:
	- token.setBarrierAsOpen(false) (/unique_chucks/25/0x5e9cf9739de6bb500db12d678ec639592fe89060.sol#524-525)
	- tokensMinted = token.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/25/0x5e9cf9739de6bb500db12d678ec639592fe89060.sol#525-529)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- hardCap (/unique_chucks/25/0x5e9cf9739de6bb500db12d678ec639592fe89060.sol#529)
	- tokensMinted (/unique_chucks/25/0x5e9cf9739de6bb500db12d678ec639592fe89060.sol#525-529)

Reentrancy in IRONtokenSale.mintTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0x5e9cf9739de6bb500db12d678ec639592fe89060.sol#620-629):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(token.mint(beneficiary,amount)) (/unique_chucks/25/0x5e9cf9739de6bb500db12d678ec639592fe89060.sol#624-625)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- HOLDersList (/unique_chucks/25/0x5e9cf9739de6bb500db12d678ec639592fe89060.sol#627-629)

IRONtokenSale.RoundIndex (/unique_chucks/25/0x5e9cf9739de6bb500db12d678ec639592fe89060.sol#568-578) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (rounds[r].start < uint256(block.timestamp)) && (uint256(block.timestamp) < rounds[r].end) (/unique_chucks/25/0x5e9cf9739de6bb500db12d678ec639592fe89060.sol#574-577)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/25/0x5e9cf9739de6bb500db12d678ec639592fe89060.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/25/0x5e9cf9739de6bb500db12d678ec639592fe89060.sol#1): it allows old versions
